body.directions: Listen to the audio, then complete the multiple choice questions that follow.

body.quiz: In which of the following places will the word in the audio most likely be used?
body.correct: Wonderfully done! 吃 chī means “to eat,” and the most suitable place for that action would definitely be in a restaurant.
body.incorrect: Very close. Listen to the audio again and think about its meaning. You can do it!

body.quiz: Which of the following words falls in the same category as the word in the audio?
body.answer: Audio for 面条 miàntiáo
options: Audio for 蓝色 lánsè
Audio for 医生 yīshēng
Audio for 朋友 péngyǒu
body.correct: Terrific job! 米饭 mǐfàn (Rice) and面条 miàntiáo(noodles) are both food items, and they belong together.
body.incorrect: So close! Listen to all four words again, and think about the meaning of each one.

body.quiz: Which of the following sentences can be completed with the word in the audio?
body.correct: Wonderful job! 喜欢 xǐhuān is a verb and should be used to describe preferences.
body.incorrect: Not quite… think about the meaning of the word in the audio and the structure in each choice.

body.quiz: Where do we most likely find the item in the audio?
body.correct: Excellently done! 奶酪nǎilào means “cheese” and can be found at a deli. Not likely to find it in a forest, is it?
body.incorrect: So close… think about the meaning of the word in the audio; then you can consider where it can be easily found.

body.quiz: Which of the following phrases can the word in the audio best complete?
body.answer: 男孩____女孩 nánhái ___ nǚhái
options: 头发_____红色 tóufà ___ hóngsè
body.correct: Wonderful job! 还是háishì means “or” and can be used between two items of similar/equal quality such as in “boy or girl.”
body.incorrect: Not quite. Think about the meaning of the word in the audio and how it can be used to connect two words or items.
